member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_NCLBUTTONDOWN
member.summary: The WM_NCLBUTTONDOWN message is posted when the user presses the left mouse button while the cursor is within the nonclient area of a window.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_NCLBUTTONUP
member.summary: The WM_NCLBUTTONUP message is posted when the user releases the left mouse button while the cursor is within the nonclient area of a window.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_SIZE
member.summary: The WM_SIZE message is sent to a window after its size has changed.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_ERASEBKGND
member.summary: The WM_ERASEBKGND message is sent when the window background must be erased (for example, when a window is resized).

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_NCCALCSIZE
member.summary: The WM_NCCALCSIZE message is sent when the size and position of a window's client area must be calculated.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_NCHITTEST
member.summary: The WM_NCHITTEST message is sent to a window when the cursor moves, or when a mouse button is pressed or released.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_NCMOUSEMOVE
member.summary: The WM_NCMOUSEMOVE message is posted to a window when the cursor is moved within the nonclient area of the window.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.WM_NCMOUSELEAVE
member.summary: The WM_NCMOUSELEAVE message is posted to a window when the cursor leaves the nonclient area of the window specified in a prior call to TrackMouseEvent.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.RibbonHelpers.WinApi.SC_RESTORE
